concept.title: Data Preview
concept.shortdesc: You can preview data to help build or fine-tune a pipeline. When you preview data, the passes data through through the pipeline. You can examine input and output data for one stage at a time or for a group of stages.

conbody.p: data previewoverviewpreviewing datadata previewWithin the data preview, you can edit data, pass it through the pipeline, and then examine the results.
You can also refresh the preview to use another set of data.More changes coming - something about data preview to a particular stage? Or is that just for inferencing?
